body_html:
I'd do tensordot based on the (private) sumproduct_pair function used by einsum. In fact, if we want this, I'd be glad to send a PR.
Medium-term, I'd like to incorporate the optimizations into einsum itself. (Numpy, did, too.)
body_text:
I'd do tensordot based on the (private) sumproduct_pair function used by einsum. In fact, if we want this, I'd be glad to send a PR.
Medium-term, I'd like to incorporate the optimizations into einsum itself. (Numpy, did, too.)
body:
I'd do tensordot based on the (private) sumproduct_pair function used by einsum. In fact, if we want this, I'd be glad to send a PR.
Medium-term, I'd like to incorporate the optimizations into einsum itself. (Numpy, did, too.)
